name: Applied Graphics
overview: Applied Graphics, Inc. provides services in the areas of productivity, promotion, printing, point of sale, inventory control, and paper and electronic bill presentment. Its products include business forms, envelopes, commercial printing, digital printing, point of purchase displays and materials, promotional products, event marketing, restaurant supplies, and corporate ID systems. The company also offers online systems, project management, progress and benefit reporting, warehousing and disaster recovery needs, packaging solutions, and RFID labels and bar codes. In addition, it offers human resource solutions, such as online peer to peer recognition programs, safety and compliance programs, and corporate identity and documents. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in San Rafael, California, with additional offices in Santa Clara, San Diego, Roseville, Richmond, and Grover Beach, California; Maui, Honolulu, and Hilo, Hawaii; and Las Vegas, Nevada. As of October 11, 2006, Applied Graphics, Inc. is a subsidiary of InnerWorkings, Inc

acquisition.source_description: InnerWorkings, Inc. Acquires Applied Graphics, Inc.
